question: This state government launches 'Bhavantar Bharpayee Yojana' for vegetable growers.
explanation: Haryana Chief Minister Manohar Lal Khattar launched Bhavantar Bharpayee Yojana from Karnal district. Under this scheme, farmers will be compensated by state government, whenever the market prices of the stipulated produce go below the mentioned prices. Haryana State Government will constitute a separate fund for this purpose. This scheme for compensation will also apply for tomato, onion, potato and cauliflower. In order to avail compensation under this scheme, farmers would have to get themselves registered on Bhavantar Bharpayee website or in the office of Haryana State Agricultural Marketing Board.
